sense.gloss: person from the countryside, countryman, countryfolk, provincial person, bumpkin, hick, hillbilly, redneck

sdata.j: この↑田舎者↑↓|いなかもの|↓めが。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑身↑↓み↓なりは↑紳士↑↓しんし↓だが、↑言葉↑↓ことば↓や↑行↑↓おこな↓いは|いなか↑者↑↓もの|↓だ。
sdata.e: His dress is that of a gentleman, but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.
